mapper.insert: insert into student (student_id, classs, NAME, sex, birthday, address, PASSWORD, parents_name, parents_number, number, sentrancedate, qq, state, admissions_teacher, grade, remarks) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sentrancedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admissionsTeacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update student set classs = #{classs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parents_name = #{parentsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parents_number = #{parentsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sentrancedate = #{sentrancedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admissions_teacher = #{admissionsTeacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select student_id, classs, NAME, sex, birthday, address, PASSWORD, parents_name, parents_number, number, sentrancedate, qq, state, admissions_teacher, grade, remarks from student where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select student_id, classs, NAME, sex, birthday, address, PASSWORD, parents_name, parents_number, number, sentrancedate, qq, state, admissions_teacher, grade, remarks from student

select student_id, classs, NAME, sex, birthday, address, PASSWORD, parents_name, parents_number, number, sentrancedate, qq, state, admissions_teacher, grade, remarks from student
NAME like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and student_id like concat('%',#{studentId},'%')

select count(1) from student
NAME like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and student_id like concat('%',#{studentId},'%')
